summary: WAS RIDDING DOWN THE HIGHWAY DOING ABOUT 65 MPH AND MY CAR JUST WENT INTO A SWERVE I RAN OFFTHE HIGHWAY INTO A DITCH WHEN I SEEN MY CAR THE WHOLE RIGHT SIDE DOOR WAS MESSED UP PRETTY GOOD.THE TIRE WAS STILL INFLATED,BUT THE WHOLE OUTSIDE OFF THE TIRE JUST PEELED OFF THERE STILL IS A LITTLE TREAD ON THE TIRE WERE YOU CAN STILL SEE HOW MUCH TREAD WAS ON THERE*AK (DOT NUMBER: B0359  TIRESIZE: 205/70R14)
